articles.content: On the same day the first American received a coronavirus vaccine, the U.S. pandemic death toll surpassed 300,000 on Monday, another grim milestone that comes less than four weeks after the number of… [+3887 chars]

articles.title: First COVID-19 vaccines in the Triad arrive at Winston-Salem hospital - WXII12 Winston-Salem
articles.description: The first COVID-19 vaccines arrive here in the Piedmont Triad.
articles.content:
WINSTON-SALEM, N.C. —The first COVID-19 vaccines arrived in the Piedmont Triad.

articles.title: WHO says authorities investigating new COVID-19 variant in England - Reuters
articles.description: The World Health Organization is aware of a new variant of COVID-19 that has emerged in Britain, but there is no evidence the strain behaves differently to existing types of the virus, it said on Monday.
articles.content:
